sen.j: 南丹市（なんたんし）は、京都府中部の丹波国に位置する市である。
sen.e: Nantan is a city located in the Tanba Province in the central part of Kyoto Prefecture.
Nantan is a city located in the Tanba Province in the central part of Kyoto Prefecture.
Nantan is a city located in the Tanba Province in the central part of Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 2006年1月1日に船井郡園部町・八木町・日吉町_(京都府)、北桑田郡美山町_(京都府)が合併して誕生。
sen.e: On January 1, 2006, Nantan City was formed as a result of the merger of the towns of Sonobe, Yagi and Hiyoshi from Funai-gun (Kyoto Prefecture), and the town of Miyama from Kitakuwada-gun (Kyoto Prefecture).
sen.cmt: 船井郡園部町・八木町・日吉町→the towns of Sonobe, Yagi and Hiyoshi from Funai-gun[3つの町すべて船井郡に位置しています。http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/北桑田郡の英語版内の表記に合わせました。]
sen.e: On January 1, 2006, Nantan City was formed as a result of the merger of the towns of Sonobe, Yagi and Hiyoshi from Funai-gun (Kyoto Prefecture), and the town of Miyama from Kitakuwada-gun (Kyoto Prefecture).

On January 1, 2006, Nantan City was formed as a result of the merger of the towns of Sonobe, Yagi and Hiyoshi from Funai-gun (Kyoto Prefecture), and the town of Miyama from Kitakuwada-gun (Kyoto Prefecture).

sen.j: 2007年の木津川市誕生までは、府内で一番新しい市であった。
sen.e: Nantan was the newest city in the prefecture until Kizukawa City was formed in 2007.
Nantan was the newest city in the prefecture until Kizukawa City was formed in 2007.
Nantan was the newest city in the prefecture until Kizugawa City was formed in 2007.

sen.j: 京都府内で新市の誕生は2004年の京丹後市以来となる。
sen.e: No new city was formed in Kyoto Prefecture until Kyotango City was formed in 2004.
No new city was formed in Kyoto Prefecture until Kyotango City was formed in 2004.
No new city was formed in Kyoto Prefecture until Kyotango City was formed in 2004.

sen.j: なお、南丹は丹波の南が語源で、市内における市役所以外の施設として京都縦貫自動車道の南丹パーキングエリアや八木町にある公立南丹病院、京都府の機関である南丹保健所や南丹土木事務所がある。
sen.e: Nantan means the south of Tanba, and other than the city hall within the city, the following are named as facilities prefixed with Nantan: the Nantan Parking Area on the Kyoto Longituinal Expressway, Nantan General Hospital in Yagi town, and Nantan Public Health Center and Nantan Civil Engineering Office which are part of the Kyoto Prefectural institutions.
sen.cmt: 八木町→Yagi town[上記と違い、単独で使われているので、そのように表記しました。]
sen.e: Nantan means the south of Tanba, and other than the city hall within the city, the following are named as facilities prefixed with Nantan: the Nantan Parking Area on the Kyoto Longituinal Expressway, Nantan General Hospital in Yagi town, and Nantan Public Health Center and Nantan Civil Engineering Office which are part of the Kyoto Prefectural institutions.

Nantan means the south of Tanba, and other than the city hall within the city, the following are named as facilities prefixed with Nantan: the Nantan Parking Area on the Kyoto Longitudinal Expressway, Nantan General Hospital in Yagi-cho, and Nantan Public Health Center and Nantan Civil Engineering Office which are part of the Kyoto Prefectural institutions.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。行政区分としての「八木町」「園部町」「日吉町」「美山町」は残っているようですので、そのように使われている箇所に関してはtown ではなく、cho としました。よってここもYagi-cho としました。

sen.j: しかし、同じく京都府の南丹広域振興局や京都府立南丹高等学校は亀岡市内にある。
sen.e: However, the Nantan Wide-Area Development Bureau which is also part of the Kyoto Prefectural institutions, and Kyoto Prefectural Nantan High School are located in Kaneoka City.
However, the Nantan Wide-Area Development Bureau which is also part of the Kyoto Prefectural institutions, and Kyoto Prefectural Nantan High School are located in Kaneoka City.
However, the Nantan Wide-Area Development Bureau which is also part of the Kyoto Prefectural institutions, and Kyoto Prefectural Nantan High School are located in Kaneoka City.

sen.j: また、八木町（亀岡市MA、市内局番40番台）と八木町以外の区域（園部MA、市内局番60、70番台）間相互通話は市外扱いになるため、市外局番(0771)が必要である。
sen.e: Any call between Yagi town (local number of 40s under the control of Kameoka City MA) and areas (local number of 60s and 70s under the control of Sonobe MA) is classified as a long distance call, and the area code (0771) has to be dialed.

Any call between Yagi town (local number of 40s under the control of Kameoka City MA) and areas (local number of 60s and 70s under the control of Sonobe MA) is classified as a long distance call, and the area code (0771) has to be dialed.

Any call between Yagi-cho (local number of 40s under the control of Kameoka City message area (MA)) and areas other than Yagi-cho (local number of 60s and 70s under the control of Sonobe message area (MA)) is classified as a long distance call, and the area code (0771) has to be dialed.
sen.cmt: 訳を一部追加しました。Message area (MA) と補足しました。

sen.j: 市域は南北に長く、京都府を南北に区切るような形をしている。
sen.e: The city area stretches long in a north-south direction in the shape of severing Kyoto Prefecture north from south.
The city area stretches long in a north-south direction in the shape of severing Kyoto Prefecture north from south.
The city area stretches long in a north-south direction in the shape of severing Kyoto Prefecture north from south.

sen.j: 日本海に注ぐ由良川と太平洋に流れる桂川と末が異なる川を持つ珍しい市である。
sen.e: Nantan is a unique city because rivers running through the city flow into a different sea like the Yura-gawa River flows to the Japan Sea, and the Katsura-gawa River flows to the Pacific Ocean.
Nantan is a unique city because rivers running through the city flow into a different sea like the Yura-gawa River flows to the Japan Sea, and the Katsura-gawa River flows to the Pacific Ocean.
Nantan is a unique city because rivers running through the city flow into a different sea like the Yura-gawa River flows to the Japan Sea, and the Katsura-gawa River flows to the Pacific Ocean.

sen.j: 京都府下では京都市に次ぐ面積を持つ。
sen.e: Nantan is the second largest city to Kyoto City in Kyoto Prefecture.
Nantan is the second largest city to Kyoto City in Kyoto Prefecture.
Nantan is the second largest city to Kyoto City in Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 美山町は豪雪地帯である。
sen.e: Miyama town is in a heavy snowfall area.
Miyama town is in a heavy snowfall area.
Miyama town is in a heavy snowfall area.

sen.j: 山 るり渓（園部町）、紫雲山（八木町）
sen.e: Moutain: Rurikei River Valley (Sonobe town) and Shiun-zan Mountain (Yagi town)
Moutain: Rurikei River Valley (Sonobe town) and Shiun-zan Mountain (Yagi town)

sen.cmt: Mt. Shiun としました。Sonobe-cho, Yagi-cho としました。

sen.j: 河川桂川_(淀川水系)（大堰川（おおいがわ）の別名を持つ）
sen.e: River: Katsura-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River System; also called Oi-gawa River)
River: Katsura-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River System; also called Oi-gawa River)

sen.j: 河川由良川（美山川（みやまがわ）の別名を持つ）
sen.e: River: Yura-gawa River (also called Miyama-gawa River)
River: Yura-gawa River (also called Miyama-gawa River)

sen.j: 他の4つの都道府県と接する市町村としては、南丹市以外には岐阜県高山市と埼玉県秩父市のみであり、大変珍しい。
sen.e: As a municipality adjacent to four prefectures, Nantan City is very rare because other than Nantan City, only Takayama City in Gifu Prefecture and Chichibu City in Saitama Prefecture are applicable.

sen.j: 当市域は歴史的にも古い。
sen.e: This city has a long history.
This city has a long history.
This city has a long history.

sen.j: 異説もあるが、旧八木町に丹波国府が置かれたり、今では地名となっている氷室があったりするなど、古くから中央律令政府とつながりは深かった。
sen.e: Although other people have different opinions, Nantan City has had a deep relationship with the central administrative government for a long time because the provincial capital was located in formerly Yagi town, and Himura (ice house used to store ice throughout the year prior to the invention of the refrigerator) which is used as a place name at present, was established there.
sen.cmt: 中央律令政府→central administrative government
sen.e: Although other people have different opinions, Nantan City has had a deep relationship with the central administrative government for a long time because the provincial capital was located in formerly Yagi town, and Himura (ice house used to store ice throughout the year prior to the invention of the refrigerator) which is used as a place name at present, was established there.

Although other people have different opinions, Nantan City has had a deep relationship with the central administrative government for a long time because the provincial capital was located in former Yagi town, and Himuro (ice house used to store ice throughout the year prior to the invention of the refrigerator) which is used as a place name at present, was established there.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: それは恐らく桂川水運が深く関係しているのだろうと思う。
sen.e: This may be deeply related to the water transportation system using the Katsura-gawa River.
This may be deeply related to the water transportation system using the Katsura-gawa River.
This may be deeply related to the water transportation system using the Katsura-gawa River.

sen.j: 室町時代にも守護細川家の守護所として八木城が築かれ、丹波一円の政務を総覧した。
sen.e: In the Muromachi period, the Yagi-jo Castle was also built as Shugosho (governor's office) of the Hosokawa family appointed as Shugo (governor), in order to comprehensively administer the affairs of whole area of Tanba Province.

In the Muromachi period, the Yagi-jo Castle was also built as Shugosho (governor's office) of the Hosokawa family appointed as Shugo (governor), in order to comprehensively administer the affairs of the entire area of Tanba Province.

In the Muromachi period, the Yagi-jo Castle was also built as Shugosho (governor's office) of the Hosokawa family appointed as Shugo (governor), in order to comprehensively administer the affairs of the entire area of Tanba Province.

sen.j: 戦国時代には、八木に守護代内藤氏、園部に武名の名高い荒木氏綱、美山町域は秦氏の末裔という（但し異説がある）川勝氏が割拠した。
sen.e: In the Sengoku period (period of warring states), the Naito clan appointed as Shugodai (representative of provincial shugo) established influence in Yagi, Ugjitsuna ARAKI renowned for military fame established influence in Sonobe, and the Kawakatsu clan believed to be a scion of the Hata clan (however, other people have different opinions) established influence in the town area of Miyama, respectively.
sen.cmt: 武名→military fame[http://www.eudict.com/?lang=jpkeng&word=武名]割拠する→establish influence[割拠する＝勢力を張るの意味なので（http://kotobank.jp/word/割拠）、勢力を張るの英訳を採用しました。]
sen.e: In the Sengoku period (period of warring states), the Naito clan appointed as Shugodai (representative of provincial shugo) established influence in Yagi, Ugjitsuna ARAKI renowned for military fame established influence in Sonobe, and the Kawakatsu clan believed to be a scion of the Hata clan (however, other people have different opinions) established influence in the town area of Miyama, respectively.

In the Sengoku period (period of warring states), the Naito clan appointed as Shugodai (representative of provincial shugo) established influence in Yagi, Ujitsuna ARAKI renowned for military fame established influence in Sonobe, and the Kawakatsu clan believed to be a scion of the Hata clan (however, other people have different opinions) established influence in the town area of Miyama, respectively.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: 江戸時代は、小出氏が園部に入部し、園部城を改築、園部藩を形成した。
sen.e: In the Edo period, the Koide clan moved into Sonobe, reconstructed the Sonobe-jo Castle, and formed the Sonobe clan.
In the Edo period, the Koide clan moved into Sonobe, reconstructed the Sonobe-jo Castle, and formed the Sonobe clan.
In the Edo period, the Koide clan moved into Sonobe, reconstructed the Sonobe-jo Castle, and formed the Sonobe clan.

sen.j: この家は明治維新までこの地の領主だった。
sen.e: The Koide clan was a feudal lord of this area before the Meiji Restoration.
The Koide clan was a feudal lord of this area before the Meiji Restoration.
The Koide clan was a feudal lord of this area before the Meiji Restoration.

sen.j: 2001年8月9日 - 京都府中部の1市8町で「京都中部地域行政改革推進会議」を設立。
sen.e: August 9, 2001- Established the 'Kyoto Council on Administrative Reform of the Central Area' consisting of one city and eight towns located in the central part of Kyoto Prefecture
August 9, 2001- Established the 'Kyoto Council on Administrative Reform of the Central Area' consisting of one city and eight towns located in the central part of Kyoto Prefecture
August 9, 2001: Established the 'Kyoto Council on Administrative Reform of the Central Area' consisting of one city and eight towns located in the central part of Kyoto Prefecture
sen.cmt: 「"On"を使わない日付+半角コロン+半角スペース+文章」の形式に変更しました。

sen.j: 亀岡市をはじめ、京都市に編入合併された京北町、京丹波町の合併に参加した3町も含まれていた。
sen.e: Kameoka City, Keihoku town merged into Kyoto City, and three towns merged with Kyotanba town were also included.
Kameoka City, Keihoku town merged into Kyoto City, and three towns merged with Kyotanba town were also included.
Kameoka City, Keihoku-cho merged into Kyoto City, and three towns merged with Kyotanba-cho were also included.

sen.j: 2004年4月1日 - 南丹市となる4町が参加した「園部町・八木町・日吉町・美山町合併協議会」が発足。
sen.e: April 1, 2004 - Established the 'Council on Merger of the Towns of Sonobe, Yagi, Hiyoshi and Miyamja' which would compose Nantan City
sen.cmt: 園部町・八木町・日吉町・美山町→towns of Sonobe, Yagi, Hiyoshi and Miyama[http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/北桑田郡の英語版内の表記に合わせました。]

sen.j: 3月30日 - 山田啓二に対し、廃置分合申請を行う。
sen.e: March 30 - Made an application to Keiji YAMADA for municipal merger.

sen.j: 11月21日 - 最後の協議会に当たる第12回合併協議会が園部町の園部国際交流会館で開催される。
sen.e: November 21 - Held the 12th Council Meeting on Merger equivalent to the final council meeting at the Sonobe International Community House in Sonobe town

sen.j: ※本庁の庁舎・駐車場は平成10年までは園部町立園部小学校校舎・体育館・運動場だった。

sen.j: 小学校の移築に伴い空き校舎となり一時は老人福祉施設として活用され、その後、園部町役場として使用される。

sen.j: ※美山町は2006年4月1日まで京北警察署の所轄であったが、京都府警察の警察署再編計画により京北警察署は廃止され、美山町は園部警察署の所轄に編入された。
